name: RingCentralMessagesforAlexa
0:
”Alexa, ask ring central to play my voicemail”
”Alexa, ask ring central to read text messages”
”Alexa, ask ring central to call 16501234567”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ring central
des:
RingCentral delivers a simple and secure communications solution by blending voice commands to access vital business features on technology you use every day. With RingCentral for Alexa, it's easy to go hands-free and stay on top of your conversations and messages anytime, anywhere.
 
Features:

- Connect Alexa to your RingCentral account
- Listen and reply to voicemail messages
- Listen to unread text messages
- Initiate a phone calls via RingOut
 
Benefits:

Seamless integration with daily life: You talk to your Alexa-enabled devices every day to check the weather, play music, and now, to manage your RingCentral messages. Stay connected at home, your office, and any workspace in between.

Voice-activated calls and texts: Use your RingCentral phone numbers to easily initiate calls, retrieve your voicemails, and even reply back using simple voice commands with your Alexa-enabled device.

Secure voice access to communications: Amazon's intelligent voice recognition feature allows Alexa-enabled devices to authenticate your identity, ensuring secure access to your business communications features.
